SEARCH
Module codes
Package codes.algorithms

Class Algorithms<T extends Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
codes.algorithms.Algorithms<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Takes in the type of element of the class.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Search<T>, Sort<T>
public class Algorithms<T extends Comparable<T>> extends Object implements Search<T>, Sort<T>
Class Algorithms, implements Search and Sort interface and is used to complete many algorithms of arrays.
Author:
Trishit Maji
